data.title: Production Development Pitching Session – IMZ International Music + Media Centre
data.text:
EBU-IMZ INTERNATIONAL CO-PRODUCTION DEVELOPMENT PITCHING SESSION 2017

Committed to opening up new avenues + opportunities for its members, the IMZ partnered up with the EBU European Broadcasting Union in order to promote the development of music + dance film projects.

After the Call for Proposals yielded 16 high-quality submissions from IMZ Members, three projects were pre-selected and invited to pitch directly to the EBU Music + Dance Experts in the course of the International Television Festival Golden Prague.

The Jury was comprised of the following EBU Experts:

Nicolas Auboyneau, France Télévision

Arild Erikstad, NRK - Norwegian Broadcasting Corporation

Christian Gilardi, RSI - Radiotelevision Svizzera

Daniel Gorjão, RTP - Rádio e Televisão de Portugal

Silvana Grujic, RTS - Serbian Broadcasting Corporation

Laetitia Huberti, RTBF - Belgian Public Radio & Television

Yasuko Kobayashi, NHK - Japan Broadcasting Corporation

Frederico Llano Sabugueiro, TVE - Televisiòn Española

Lothar Mattner, WDR - Westdeutscher Rundfunk

Miikka Maunula, YLE - Finnish Broadcasting Company

Jon Ola Sand, EBU - European Broadcasting Union

Linda Olte, LTV - Latvian Television

Hélène Peu du Vallon, France Télévision

Heidi Pruuli, ERR - Estonian Public Broadcasting

Marija Ramljak, HRT - Croatian Radiotelevision

Elen Rhys, S4C Wales

Ieva Rozentale, LTV - Latvian Television

Vítězslav Sýkora, Czech Television

Søren Therkelsen, DR - Danish Broadcasting Corporation

Tobias Feilen, ZDF - Zweites Deutsches Fernsehen

Martin Traxl, ORF - Österreichischer Rundfunk

Heikki Valsta, YLE - Finnish Broadcasting Company

Michal Warchol, TVP - Polish Television

Irina Zimonyi, MTVA Hungary
